model.io

Class JsonSimpleReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.io.JsonSimpleReader

  • public class JsonSimpleReader
extends Object
    This class contains method to read a json file.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static JsonSimpleReader read(String filename)
                             throws FileNotFoundException
        Read the json file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path.
        Returns:
        a instance of this object.
        Throws:
        com.google.gson.JsonIOException - If you couldn't read an input stream or write in one.
        com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the file you are trying to read (or write) is a malformed JSON element.
        FileNotFoundException - if the named file does not exist, is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading.
